content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electronic Circuit Production Line at position(9.5, 11.5)
Consists of:
- Input wooden chest at position(6.5, 11.5)
- Burner inserter at position(7.5, 11.5) that moves items from input chest to assembling machine
- Assembling machine-1 at position(9.5, 11.5) crafting electronic circuits
- Burner inserter at position(11.5, 11.5) that moves finished products to output chest
- Output wooden chest at position(12.5, 11.5) containing 801 electronic circuits

### Power Generation System around position(-7.0, 24.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at position(-9.5, 24.5)
- Pipe network carrying water from pump to boiler
- Boiler at position(-7.0, 24.5) powered by coal
- Steam pipe network from boiler to steam engine
- Steam engine at position(-2.5, 24.5)
- Electric pole network connecting power to other structures

### Research Lab System around position(0.5, 28.5)
Consists of:
- Lab with automation and logistic science packs loaded
- Burner inserter at position(0.5, 30.5) feeding the lab
- Storage chest at position(0.5, 31.5) containing science packs (865 automation, 347 logistic)

### Smelting Area
Consists of three stone furnaces:
- Furnace at position(0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position(2.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position(4.0, 4.0)
All furnaces are currently idle but fueled with coal

ERROR TIPS

### Research Technology Prerequisites Not Met
- Ensure all prerequisite technologies are researched before attempting new research:
  - Chemical science pack requires advanced electronics
  - Advanced electronics requires plastics
  - Plastics requires oil processing
  - Oil processing requires fluid handling
  - Fluid handling requires engine technology
  - Electric engine requires lubricant technology

### Attempting to Research Already Completed Technologies
- Check if technology is already researched before attempting to research:
  - Advanced material processing
  - Steel processing
  - Military science
  - Logistics science pack
  - Electronics
  - Electric energy distribution

### Resource Shortages
- Electronic circuit production is stalled due to missing:
  - Iron plates (1)
  - Copper cables (3)
- Ensure proper supply of raw materials to production lines

### Fuel Management
- Monitor coal levels in burner inserters and boilers to maintain continuous operation
- Replenish coal before it runs out completely
